column5: Hey guys this year we'll be staying overnite in Ear Falls, are there any suggestions on were we might have dinner ?Thank's
Hotel 105Great food, big portions and fair pricing ...
We always stop at the Trillium before heading on North. It is clean and good.

The Trillium and the 105 both have good food. We stayed at the Trillium last week and got pizza from the place in the little mall in Ear Falls, which was also good. If you're going soon you'd better check on room availability, there are hundreds of firefighters staying in the area and rooms are pretty scarce. We talked tio the group coming in as we were going out Sat AM and they got the last room at the Trillium Friday night.
try evergreen lodge as they 3 small camping cabins they rent out by the night. only a half a mile east of ear falls on the gold pines road.
I just got back from Ear Falls. The pizza place in the mall was great. Yhey have other food also. We had 32 people and they stayed open late to accomadate our group. Great owners.
